title: FS: Graded HOF'ers and a few team-mates !
author: Joshwesley

posts.post_title: FS: Graded HOF'ers and a few team-mates !
posts.post_content:
I've got a few t-206's for sale and the details are below:
I have only completed a few transactions on the boards, but for reference purposes... I've had the pleasure of dealing with:
Frank burkett, t206fix (Tony), Brian Weisner, and ErikV.

Up first:

Bob Unglaub BVG 3.5 (sweet cap)
$38.00

Second: 
Hughie Jennings PSA 2 (sweet cap 350-460, factory 42)
(One hand shows)
SOLD!


Third:
Frank chance SGC 30 (red portrait)
Sovereign 150
$SOLD!

Bill Milligan SGC 20 (polar bear)
$30.00


Please Pm Me for pics (trying to figure out how to get these from my phone to the post).

Would prefer PayPal (gift) as payment.
Please add $3.00 for shipping.

Feel free to ask any questions and thanks!


Josh

Frank chance is off the board! All others remain.

Thanks

bump...
reduced prices on the remaining 3!
